description.plain:
Dodie Clark (born Dorothy Miranda Clark on April 11, 1995) is an English YouTuber and singer-songwriter, more commonly known by her YouTube handle, doddleoddle, or stage name dodie. She is known for her piano and ukulele covers of various songs and her soothing voice.

Dodie started vlogging in 2007 with a friend of hers and started singing on YouTube in 2011 on a newly created channel, doddleoddle. In addition to her main channel, Dodie has a side channel named doddlevloggle.

On November 18, 2016, dodie self-released her first EP titled Intertwined, which ranked #35 on the UK album charts during it’s first week of release. Dodie’s second EP titled You was released on August 11, 2017. You debuted at #6 on the official UK albums chart, and ranked #55 on the US Billboard 200.

On November 2, 2017, dodie released a memoir titled Secrets for the Mad: Obsessions, Confessions, and Life Lessons.

dodie released her third EP, Human, on January 18, 2019.

Her debut album, Build A Problem, was released on May 7, 2021.
